tutorials.title: How do I Create Oracle Recovery Manager (RMAN) Catalog?
tutorials.description: In this sprint, we will provide the steps how to create Oracle Recovery Manager Catalog to store information on RMAN backups

tutorials.title: Other related Sprints - How do I setup Oracle RMAN Backup?
tutorials.description: In this sprint, we will provide the steps how to register database, configure parameters and take database backup using RMAN
